channel.title: Could some one come on my server and make me a shop
channel.description:
hey i just added a new pk spot and im trying to make a shop their.
I have added the npc in autospawn.cfg i have added the shop in client.java. i have added the shop in shops.cfg
But when i click trade i get dis connected so i was wondering if some1 could do it for me.
come talk to me on my server my name is pures r us
Send me a pm if you can make me a shop.
SERVER IP. wtpdkpk.no-ip.biz
Thanks alot!
